snippet: Otis Houston Jr., who strikes poses and recites poetry to commuters inching along the F.D.R. Drive, is the subject of a short documentary that will be screened at a film festival next month.
abstract: Otis Houston Jr., who strikes poses and recites poetry to commuters inching along the F.D.R. Drive, is the subject of a short documentary that will be screened at a film festival next month.

headline.main: After 15 Years, a Roadside Performer Is Getting the Spotlight
headline.print_headline: After 15 Years, Roadside Performer Will Get a Stationary Audience
